meanings.sent1: After drinking soda too quickly, I started to yex loudly.
meanings.sent2: Sometimes when I eat too fast, I yex uncontrollably.
meanings.sent3: My little brother always tries to yex on purpose to make us laugh.
meanings.sent4: The old car engine sputtered and yexed before finally starting.
meanings.sent5: The baby's constant yexing kept everyone awake at night.

meanings.sent1: His loud yex surprised everyone in the quiet room.
meanings.sent2: I always get a yex after drinking fizzy drinks.
meanings.sent3: The yex echoed in the empty hallway, making it sound haunted.
meanings.sent4: The sudden yex of the dog made the cat jump in fright.
meanings.sent5: The yex smelled of the garlic bread he had just eaten.
